comments.body:
i don't particularly like the 1 second delay we're adding to the tests here.
we send the GETACK request in every cron, so normally it would unblock after 100ms.
maybe we want to reduce the timeout? or find another way?

for instance, we can use `attach_to_replication_stream` to see what's exactly going into the replication stream.
I was copying the pattern from above, mind if this get's punted to a separate PR? The wait tests currently take like 10 seconds.
ok, we'll handle it some other day.
